mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM JAEGO WHERE JAEGOSTAT = 'GOOD'

SELECT JAEGOCODE,SANGCODE,SANGNAME,JAEGOCNT,JAEGOSTAT FROM (SELECT ROWNUM,JAEGOCODE,SANGCODE,SANGNAME,JAEGOCNT,JAEGOSTAT FROM (SELECT JAEGOCODE,SANGCODE,SANGNAME,JAEGOCNT,JAEGOSTAT FROM JAEGO JOIN PRODUCT USING(SANGCODE) ORDER BY SANGNAME)) WHERE JAEGOSTAT = 'GOOD' AND ROWNUM BETWEEN #{first} AND #{last}

SELECT IPGONUM,JAEGOCODE,IPGODATE,IPGOCNT,EXPDATE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM,IPGONUM,JAEGOCODE,IPGODATE,IPGOCNT,EXPDATE FROM (SELECT IPGONUM,JAEGOCODE,TO_CHAR(IPGODATE,'YYYYMMDD') IPGODATE,IPGOCNT,TO_CHAR(EXPDATE,'YYYYMMDD') EXPDATE FROM IPGO ORDER BY IPGODATE DESC)) WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN #{first} AND #{last}

SELECT PYEGINUM,JAEGOCODE,PYEGICNT,PYEGISAYU FROM (SELECT ROWNUM,PYEGINUM,JAEGOCODE,PYEGICNT,PYEGISAYU FROM (SELECT PYEGINUM,JAEGOCODE,PYEGICNT,PYEGISAYU FROM PYEGI)) WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN #{first} AND #{last}
mapper.update: UPDATE JAEGO J SET JAEGOCNT = (SELECT JAEGOCNT-JAE.JUM FROM (SELECT JU.JUMCNT JUM FROM PAYHISTORY P , JUMUN JU WHERE P.JUMUNNUM = JU.JUMUNNUM AND P.PAYNUM = #{paynum}) JAE) WHERE SANGCODE = (SELECT S.SANGCODE FROM PAYHISTORY P,JUMUN JU,JUMUNPAGE S,PRODUCT SG WHERE P.PAYNUM = #{paynum} AND P.JUMUNNUM = JU.JUMUNNUM AND JU.SANGPGNUM=S.SANGPGNUM AND SG.SANGCODE=S.SANGCODE)

UPDATE JAEGO J SET J.JAEGOCNT = J.JAEGOCNT - (SELECT P.PYEGICNT FROM PYEGI P WHERE P.PYEGINUM =#{pyeginum} AND P.JAEGOCODE=J.JAEGOCODE AND P.PYEGIFLAG = 'N') WHERE J.JAEGOCODE = (SELECT P.JAEGOCODE FROM PYEGI P WHERE P.PYEGINUM=#{pyeginum} AND P.JAEGOCODE=J.JAEGOCODE AND P.PYEGIFLAG = 'N')
UPDATE JAEGO SET JAEGOSTAT='BAD' WHERE JAEGOCNT = 0
